Aplikacija podrazumeva efikasno i pouzda: The application implies an efficient and reliable solution that is easy to use and represents a necessary step towards the improvement of the management system. It is a reliable tool for eliminating unnecessary losses that occur due to slow distribution of documents, unnecessary costs of printing documents, inaccurate control of access to documents, frequent use of invalid versions of documents, untimely or inadequate notification of employees about all changes in the system, etc.
Osim opštih, specifični benefiti primene: In addition to the general, specific benefits of the application are:
Obezbeđuje ažurnost korišćene dokumentac: Ensures the up-to-dateness of the documentation
Olakšava planiranje i organizovanje inte: Facilitates the planning and organization of internal audits
Obezbeđuje jasno i pregledno praćenje po: Provides clear and transparent monitoring of the needs and requirements of stakeholders
Olakšava praćenje performansi i ocenjiva: Facilitates performance monitoring and external supplier evaluation
Značajno ubrzava i pojednostavljuje proc: Significantly speeds up and simplifies the review process by management
Omogućava centralizovano i sistemsko pra: It enables centralized and systematic monitoring of goals, as well as the degree of their realization
Smanjuje rizik od gubljenja/suspenzije s: Reduces the risk of losing / suspending the certificate

IMSA aplikacija je kreirana u saradnji s: IMSA application has been created in cooperation with  domestic and foreign  experts in consulting  and standardization area and it is designed according to ISO standards requests and processes.
Svima koji žele da unaprede svoj sistem: For those who want to improve their management system.
Organizacijama koje imaju implementirane: For organizations that already have implemented ISO standards.
Organizacijama koje treba da uvedu ISO s: For organizations that should implement ISO standard – IMSA application enables them to take the implementation process easy, fast and without engaging consulting agencies.
Benefiti primene aplikacije su:: Benefits of using the application are:
centralizovano i sistemsko praćenje cilj: Centralized and systematic monitoring of goals, as well as their level of achievement
jasno i pregledno praćenje potreba i zah: Clear monitoring of stakeholders’ needs and requirements
olakšano praćenje performansi i ocenjiva: Simplified performance monitoring and assessment of deliverers
značajno ubrzan i pojednostavljen proces: Significantly accelerated and simplified review process by the management
modernizovano planiranje i organizovanje: Modernized planning and organizing internal checks
smanjen rizik od gubljenja/suspenzije se: Lowering risk of losing / suspension of certificates
pristup 24/7 s bilo kog računara, laptop: 24/7 access from any computer, laptop, tablet, smart phone with an Internet connection
Prema zahtevu, IMSA može biti kreirana z: According to the request, IMSA may be created for ISO standard you need.
Objedinjeni su svi sistemski procesi i z: Because all of ISO standards’ system processes and requests are included. It can be applied to the entire organization  regardless of the economic activity.
Nema više registratora, troškova nabavke: There are no more files, costs such as  procurement of paper, printers and toners.
Bezbednost dokumentacije (ako se poplavi: Documentation safety (in case of warehouse floods, fires or data loss)
Koliko vremena provedete u obuci zaposle: How much time do you spend in employees’ education?
IMSA je kreirana da uštedi vreme zaposle: IMSA is created to save employees’ time because documentation, system processes, and notifications are clearly defined according to deadlines  - they are also received  by e-mail and they  are helpful to process managers to perform their tasks in an efficient way – with no errors and delays.
Da li su mi pored IMSA aplikacije potreb: If I have IMSA application, do I need some consulting services?
Uz korišćenje IMSA aplikacije troškovi c: By using IMSA application, costs of consulting are significantly lower, or in some cases they are eliminated, because IMSA application provides regular updates and adjustments according to new versions of ISO standards.
Zašto je bolje iznajmiti nego kupiti IMS: Why is it better to subscribe to IMSA instead of buying it?
Možete odustati u svakom trenutku: You can cancel it at any moment
Ušteda u IT podršci – redovno ažuriranje: Savings in IT support -  regular updates and adjustments  are included in the price – so, there are no additional costs later.
DA. Jedini vlasnici podataka ste vi, naš: YES. The only owner of data is you. Our IT support only covers application segments, not the content.
Ima. Mnogo će vam olakšati poslovanje, p: YES. It will make your business much easier, so it will “spoil“ you slightly.
IMSA aplikacija omogućava upravljanje do: IMSA application enables managing documentation and processes requested by ISO standards.
Korisnici koje treba obavestiti: Users who need to be notified
Uspešno ste se prijavili na naš newslett: You have successfully subscribed to the newsletter!

Možete se odjaviti u bilo kom trenutku k: You can unsubscribe at any time by clicking the button below
Kreiran je novi plan interne provere: New internal check plan has been created
Preispitivanje politika bezbednosti info: Review of the policies of information security
Rukovodstvo mora da definiše i odobri sk: The management must define and approve the collection of information security policies, it must publish them and announce them to all the employees and relevant external parties
Uloge i odgovornosti u pogledu bezbednos: Roles and responsibilities in terms of information security
Politike bezbednosti informacija se mora: Policies of information security must be reviewed in planned intervals or in case that significant changes appear, in order to ensure their propriety, adequacy and effectiveness
Da bi se smanjile prilike za neovlašćenu: In order to reduce the opportunities for unauthorized or unintentional modification or abuse of the organization’s property, it is necessary to separate conflicting duties and the areas of responsibility
Moraju se održavati odgovarajući kontakt: It is necessary to keep appropriate contacts with relevant authorized bodies
It is necessary to keep adequate contacts with special interested groups or other specialized forums and professional associations in the domain of security
Bezbednost informacija mora se uzeti u o: Information security must be taken into account when managing projects regardless of the kind of the project
Moraju se usvojiti politika i pomoćne me: It is necessary to adopt the policy and auxiliary measures of security in order to manage the risks arising from the use of mobile devices
Moraju biti implementirane politika i po: It is necessary to implement the policy and auxiliary measures of security in order to protect the information that is accessed, processed and stored at distant locations
Moraju se sprovesti zasebne provere radi: It is necessary to carry out separate tests for the purpose of verifying all candidates for employment in accordance with the relevant laws, regulations and ethical rules, in proportion to the business demands, classification of the information that will be accessed to, and perceived risks.
Upoznavanje sa bezbednošću informacija,: Familiarization with information security, education and training
Svi zaposleni u organizaciji i, onda kad: All the employees in the organization and also the contractors, when this is important, must be regularly trained and they must regularly renew their knowledge of the policies and procedures in the organization in a way that matches their business function.
Rukovodstvo mora da zahteva od svih zapo: The management must demand from all employees and contractors to apply information security in accordance with the established policies and procedures in the organization.
U ugovornim sporazumima sa zaposlenima i: In contract agreements with the employees and contractors, their responsibilities and the organization's responsibilities with respect to information security must also be mentioned.
Mora da postoji zvanični disciplinski po: There must be an official disciplinary procedure that the employees are familiar with in order to take measures against those employees who violated information security.
Odgovornosti prilikom prestanka ili prom: Responsibilities upon the termination or change of employment
Odgovornosti koje se odnose na bezbednos: Responsibilities that refer to information security and duties which remain valid after the termination or change of employment must be defined and announced to the employee or the contractor, and they must be applied.
Popisivanje imovine: Making an inventory list of assets
Imovina povezana sa informacijama i opre: The assets related to information and the equipment for information processing must be identified and an inventory list of these assets must be made, which must be maintained.
Popisana imovina mora da bude u vlasništ: The assets listed in the inventory list must be in ownership
Moraju da se identifikuju, dokumentuju i: It is necessary to identify, document and implement rules for the acceptable use of the information and assets related to information and the equipment for information processing.
Svi zaposleni i eksterni korisnici moraj: All employees and external users must restitute all the organization's assets that they possess after the termination of their employment, contract or agreement.
Informacije se moraju klasifikovati u po: Information must be classified with respect to legal requirements, their values, criticality and sensitivity to unauthorized disclosure or modification
Za označavanje informacija mora se razvi: When it comes to the marking of information, it is necessary to develop and implement the appropriate group of procedures in accordance with the classification scheme adopted by the organization.
Za postupanje sa imovinom moraju se razv: When it comes to handling the assets,it is necessary to develop and implement procedures in accordance with the classification scheme that the organization has adopted.
Moraju se implementirati procedure za me: It is necessary to implement the procedures for transmission media management which are in accordance with the classification scheme that the organization has adopted.
Kada više nisu potrebni, medijumi se mor: When they are no longer needed, the media must be decommissioned in a secure manner with the application of formal procedures.
Medijumi koji sadrže informacije moraju: The media that contain information must be protected from unauthorized access, abuse or damage during transportation.
Politika kontrole pristupa mora da bude: The policy of access control must be established and documented and it must be reviewed based on business demands and information security demands.
Pristup mrežama i mrežnim uslugama: Access to networks and network services
Korisnicima mora biti obezbeđen pristup: Users must have provided access only to the network and network services that they are authorized to use
Mora se implementirati formalna procedur: It is necessary to implement the formal procedure for the registration and deletion of users in order to ensure the granting of the access right.
It is necessary to implement a formal procedure for reservation with the aim of granting or taking away from all kinds of users the access right to all kinds of systems and services
Menadžment privilegovanim pravima na pri: Management of the privileged access rights
Dodela i korišćenje privilegovanih prava: Granting and usage of privileged access rights must be restricted and under control.
Menadžment tajnim informacijama za prove: Classified information management for checking the trustworthiness of a user
Dodela tajnih informacija za proveru ver: The granting of classified information for checking trustworthiness must be controlled with a formal management process.
Preispitivanje prava korisnika na pristu: Review of a user's access right
Vlasnici imovine moraju da vrše preispit: The owners of assets must carry out the review of a user's access right in regular intervals.
Ukidanje ili prilagođavanje prava na pri: Abolishment or adaptation of the access right.
Svim zaposlenima i eksternim korisnicima: To all employees and external users of information and the equipment for information processing, upon the termination of employment, expiry of contract or agreement, it is necessary to abolish their access right or it must be adapted in accordance with the change incurred.
Korišćenje tajnih informacija za autenti: The use of classified information for authentication
Korisnici se moraju obavezati da će se p: Users must commit themselves to complying with the practice of organization when using classified information for authentication
Pristup informacijama i funkcijama aplik: Access to the information and functions of the applicative system must be restricted in accordance with the policy of access control.
Pristup sistemima i aplikacijama mora da: Access to the systems and applications must be controlled by means of the procedure for security login when this is required by the policy of access control.
Sistemi upravljanja lozinkama moraju da: The systems of password management must be interactive and they must ensure quality passwords
Korišćenje uslužnih programa sa privileg: The usage of utility programs with privileged access rights
The usage of utility programs with privileged access rights, by means of which it is possible to overcome the existing systemic and applicative controls, must be restricted and rigorously controlled.
Kontrola pristupa izvornom programskom k: Control of access to the source program code
Pristup izvornom programskom kodu mora d: Access to the source program code must be restricted
Politika korišćenja kriptografskih kontr: The policy of using cryptographic controls
Radi zaštite informacija mora se razviti: For the purpose of information protection, it is necessary to develop and apply the policy of using cryptographic controls.
Politika korišćenja, zaštite i životnog: The policy of the usage, protection and life-span of cryptographic keys must be developed and applied during their entire life cycle.
Fizička bezbednost i bezbednost u okruže: Physical security and security in the environment
Zona razdvajanja fizičke bezbednosti: The zone of physical security separation
Da bi se zaštitile oblasti u kojima se n: In order to protect the areas where there is sensitive or critical information and the equipment for information processing, it is necessary to define and use the security separation zone
Bezbedne oblasti moraju da budu zaštićen: The secure areas must be protected with appropriate access controls in order to ensure that only the authorized personnel are granted access.
Zaštita kancelarija, prostorija i sredst: Protection of offices, rooms, and materials
Treba projektovati i primeniti fizičku b: It is necessary to design and apply physical security for offices, rooms, and materials
Zaštita od eksternih pretnji i pretnji i: Protection against external threats and threats from the environment
Mora se projektovati i primeniti fizička: It is necessary to design and apply physical protection from natural disasters, malicious attacks or accidents.
Moraju se projektovati i primenjivati pr: It is necessary to design and apply the procedures for work in secure areas
Tačke pristupa kao što su područja za is: The access points such as the areas for delivery and loading, as well as other places where unauthorized persons may enter official premises, must be controlled and, if possible, separated from the equipment for information processing in order to avoid unauthorized access.
Oprema se mora postaviti ili zaštititi t: The equipment must be installed or protected in order to reduce the risks of threats and danger from the environment as well as the possibilities of unauthorized access.
Oprema mora da bude zaštićena od otkaza: The equipment must be protected from the failure of supply and other interruptions resulting from the failures of other auxiliary support functions.
Kablovi za napajanje i telekomunikacioni: Supply cables and telecommunication cables which transmit data or are support for information services must be protected from interceptions, obstruction or damage.
Oprema se mora ispravno održavati da bi: The equipment must be properly maintained in order to ensure its uninterrupted availability and integrity.
Oprema, informacije ili softver ne smeju: It is forbidden to relocate the equipment, information or software without previously obtaining a consent.
Bezbednost izmeštene opreme i imovine: The security of relocated equipment and assets
Na izmeštenu imovinu moraju se primeniti: Security mechanisms must be applied to relocated assets, taking different risks into account when working outside of the organization's premises.
Bezbedno rashodovanje ili ponovno korišć: Secure decommissioning or reuse of equipment
Svi delovi opreme koji sadrže medijume z: All the parts of the equipment that contain media for data storage must be verified to ensure that, before decommission or re-use, all the sensitive data and licensed software are removed or surely crossed out.
Korisnici moraju da osiguraju da oprema: Users must ensure that the equipment without surveillance has appropriate protection.
Za prenosne medijume za skladištenje i z: When it comes to the transmission media for storage and for papers, it is necessary to adopt the clear desk policy, and when it comes to the information processing tools, it is necessary to adopt the clear screen policy.
Radne procedure moraju da budu dokumento: The work procedures must be documented and available to all the users who need them.
Moraju se kontrolisati promene u organiz: It is necessary to control changes in organization, business processes, the equipment for information processing and the systems that impact the security of information.
Korišćenje resursa mora se pratiti i pod: The usage of resources must be monitored and adjusted and it is necessary to make projections of requests for capacities in the future to ensure the required system performance.
Razdvajanje okruženja za razvoj, ispitiv: Separation of the environment for development, testing and work
Okruženja za razvoj, ispitivanje i rad m: The environments for development, testing and work must be separated from one another to reduce the risks of unauthorized access or changes in the working environment.
Moraju se implementirati kontrole otkriv: It is necessary to implement the controls of disclosure, prevention and recovery for the sake of protection against malicious software, along with the development of appropriate user awareness.
Rezervne kopije informacija, softvera i: Reserve copies of information, software and system copies must be regularly made and reviewed in accordance with the agreed policy of copy-making.
Moraju se praviti logovi o događajima u: It is necessary to make event logs where user activities, exceptions, errors and events apropos of information security are recorded, and those logs must be kept and regularly reviewed.
Sredstva za logove i informacije u njima: The tools for logs and the information in them must be protected from unauthorized modification and access.
Aktivnosti administratora i operatera si: Administrator and system operator activities must be recorded in logs, and those logs must be protected and regularly reviewed.
Satovi svih odgovarajućih sistema za obr: The clocks of all appropriate systems for information processing within an organization or a security domain must be synchronized with a single reference source of accurate time.
Instalacija softvera na sistemima: Installation of software on the systems
Moraju se implementirati procedure za ko: It is necessary to implement the procedures for controlling the installation of software on the systems
Moraju se blagovremeno prikupiti informa: It is necessary to timely gather information on the technical vulnerabilities of the information systems that are used, to evaluate the exposure of the organization to these vulnerabilities, and to take appropriate measures, taking the accompanying risk into account.
Ograničenja u pogledu instalacije softve: Restrictions in terms of software installation
Pravila koja regulišu instalaciju softve: The rules that regulate software installation on the part of the user must be established and implemented
Kontrole za proveru informacionih sistem: Controls for checkup of the information systems
Zahtevi za proveru i aktivnosti koje obu: Requests for checkup and activities that include the verification of operating systems must be carefully planned and agreed so that the interruptions of business processes would be reduced to the minimum.
Mrežama se mora upravljati i one se mora: Networks must be managed and they must be controlled in order to protect information in the systems and applications.
Kod svakog sporazuma o mrežnim uslugama,: In every agreement on network services, it is necessary for all network services to identify and include the mechanisms of security, levels of services, and requests for management, whether these services are provided within the organization or from outsource.
U mrežama moraju da budu međusobno razdv: In networks, the groups of information services, users and information systems must be separated from one another.
Politike i procedure pri prenosu informa: Policies and procedures during information transmission
Da bi se prenos informacija pomoću svih: In order to protect the transmission of information via all means of communication, it is necessary to establish official policies, procedures and controls.
Sporazumi moraju da obuhvate siguran pre: Agreements must include a secure transmission of business information between the organization and external parties
Informacije uključene u razmenu elektron: Information included in the exchange of electronic messages must be protected in the appropriate manner
Zahtevi za sporazume o poverljivosti ili: Requests for confidentiality or non-disclosure agreements which reflect the organization’s needs for information protection must be identified, regularly reviewed, and documented.
Nabavka, razvoj i održavanje sistema: Supply, development and maintenance of the system
Analiza i specificiranje zahteva za bezb: Analysis and specification of requests for information security
U zahteve za nove informacione sisteme i: The requests for new information systems or for the improvement of the existing information systems must include requests that refer to information security.
Obezbeđivanje aplikativnih usluga u javn: Provision of applicative services in public networks
Informacije obuhvaćene aplikativnim uslu: The information covered by the applicative services that go through public networks must be protected from malversation, breach of contract, and unauthorized disclosure and modification.
Zaštita transakcija aplikativnih usluga: Protection of the transaction of applicative services
Informacije uključene u transakcije apli: The information included in the transactions of applicative services must be protected to prevent incomplete transmission, wrong direction, unauthorized modification of messages, unauthorized disclosure, unauthorized copying of messages or re-emission.
Pravila za razvoj softvera i sistema mor: Rules for the development of software and the system must be established and applied to development within the organization
Procedure za kontrolu promena sistema: Procedures for the control of system change
Promene na sistemu tokom razvojnog život: Changes to the system during the developmental life cycle must be controlled through the application of formal procedures for the control of changes.
Tehničko preispitivanje aplikacija posle: Technical review of applications after changes in the operating platform
Pri vršenju promena na operativnim platf: When making changes in the operating platforms, all significant applications in terms of business must be reviewed and tested in order to ensure that there are no unfavorable impacts on the functioning or security of the organization.
Ograničenja za promene na softverskim pa: Restrictions for changes in software packages
Modifikacije na softverskim paketima se: Modifications in software packages must be considered undesirable, they must be limited to the necessary changes, and all the changes must be strictly controlled.
Principi za inženjering sigurnih sistema: Secure system engineering principles must be established, documented, maintained, and applied to all attempts at implementing information systems.
Organizacije moraju da uspostave i da na: The organizations must establish and appropriately protect the secure environment for system development and the attempts at integration which include the entire developmental life cycle.
Organizacija mora da nadgleda i prati ak: The organization must oversee and monitor the activities of system development in outsource
Ispitivanje funkcionalne bezbednosti mor: The testing of functional security must be carried out in the course of development
Programi za ispitivanje prihvatanja i od: The programs for acceptance testing and the appropriate criteria must be established for new information systems, for upgrading the existing ones, and for new versions.
Podaci o testiranju moraju se pažljivo o: Testing data must be carefully selected, protected and kept under control.
Politika bezbednosti informacija za odno: The policy of information security for relationships with suppliers
Zahtevi za bezbednost informacija koji s: Requests for information security which refer to the mitigation of the risk related to suppliers’ access to the organization’s assets must be agreed upon with the supplier and documented.
Rešavanje pitanja bezbednosti u sporazum: Solving the question of security in agreements with suppliers
Svi relevantni zahtevi koji se odnose na: All the relevant requests that refer to information security must be established and agreed with every supplier who can access, process, keep, transmit or provide the components of IT structure for the organization’s information.
Lanac isporučilaca u informacionim i kom: The chain of suppliers in information and communication technologies
Sporazumi sa isporučiocima moraju da ukl: Agreements with suppliers must include requests for solving the problem of information security risk which refer to the chain of service providers in information and communication technologies and product providers.
Praćenje i preispitivanje usluga isporuč: Monitoring and review of supplier services
Organizacije moraju redovno da prate, pr: Organizations must regularly follow, review and check supplier delivery.
Mora se upravljati promenama u obezbeđiv: It is necessary to manage changes in the provision of supplier services, including the maintenance and improvement of the existing policies of the security of information, procedures and controls, taking into account the criticality of business information, the system and the process that is included in the review of risk.
Moraju se uspostaviti odgovornosti rukov: It is necessary to establish the responsibilities and procedures of the management in order to ensure a quick, effective and orderly manner of responding to information security incidents.
Izveštavanje o događajima u vezi sa bezb: Reporting on events in relation to information security
O događajima u vezi sa bezbednošću infor: It is necessary to report on the events relating to information security as quickly as possible, via the management's appropriate channels
Izveštavanje o slabostima u vezi sa bezb: Reporting on weaknesses in relation to information security
Od zaposlenih i ugovarača koji koriste i: It must be demanded of the employees and contractors who use the information systems and the organization’s services to write down and report on every perceived or suspicious weakening of security in the systems or services.
Ocenjivanje i odluke o događajima u vezi: Evaluation and decisions about the events relating to information security
Događaji u vezi sa bezbednošću informaci: The events relating to information security must be evaluated and it must be decided whether it is necessary to classify them as information security incidents.
Mora se odgovoriti na incidente narušava: It is necessary to respond to information security incidents in accordance with documented procedures
Prikupljanje znanja iz incidenata naruša: Gathering knowledge from information security incidents
Prikupljeno znanje iz analiziranja i reš: The gathered knowledge from analyzing and solving information security incidents must be used to lessen the probability of the occurrence or impact of future incidents.
Organizacija mora da definiše i primenju: The organization must define and apply procedures for the identification, collection, takeover and keeping of the information that may serve as evidence
Aspekti bezbednosti informacija kod mena: Aspects of information security in business operation continuity management
Planiranje kontinuiteta bezbednosti info: Planning the continuity of information security
Organizacija mora da utvrdi svoje zahtev: The organization must ascertain its requests which refer to information security and the continuity of information security management in unfavorable situations, for instance, during crises or catastrophes.
Organizacija mora da uspostavi, dokument: The organization must establish, document, implement and maintain the processes, procedures and controls to ensure the required level of continuity for information security during unfavorable situations.
Verifikacija, preispitivanje i procenjiv: Verification, review and assessment of the continuity of information security
Organizacija mora da verifikuje uspostav: The organization must verify the established and implemented controls of information security continuity in regular intervals to ensure that they are valid and efficient during unfavorable situations.
Dostupnost sredstava za obradu informaci: Availability of the information processing tools
Sredstva za obradu informacija moraju bi: The information processing tools must be implemented with sufficient redundancy to meet the requirements that refer to availability.
Identifikacija primenljivih zakona i ugo: Identification of applicable laws and contractual requirements
Za svaki informacioni sistem i organizac: For every information system and organization, it is necessary to explicitly identify, document, and regularly update all the relevant requirements from the laws and regulations, and then the statutory and contractual requirements, as well as the organization's access to the fulfillment of those requirements.
Moraju se implementirati odgovarajuće pr: It is necessary to implement appropriate procedures in order to ensure harmony with the regulations, legal and contractual requirements that pertain to intellectual property rights and software products with ownership protection.
Zapisi se moraju zaštititi od gubljenja,: Records must be protected from loss, destruction, falsification, unauthorized access and unauthorized publication in accordance with the regulations, legal, contractual and business requirements.
Moraju se osigurati tajnost i zaštita in: It is necessary to ensure the secrecy and protection of personal data in a way that is demanded in the relevant legal acts and regulations, where this is applicable.
Kriptografske kontrole se moraju primenj: Cryptographic controls must be applied in accordance with all the relevant agreements, legal acts and regulations.
Pristup organizacije upravljanju bezbedn: The organization’s access to information security management and its implementation (i.e. the goals of controls, controls, policies, processes and procedures for information security) must be independently reviewed in planned intervals or when significant changes appear.
Usklađenost sa politikama bezbednosti i: Harmony with the policies of security and the standards
Rukovodstvo mora redovno da preispituje: The management must regularly review harmony between the information processes and procedures within their area of responsibility on the one hand and the relevant policies of security, standards, and all other security requirements on the other.
Mora se redovno preispitivati usklađenos: It is necessary to regularly review harmony between the information systems, on the one hand, and the organization's information security and standards on the other.
